trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML-friendly implementation of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that filters on a single action.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de XAML amigável de um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"> </xref> que filtra numa única ação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ação para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A ação para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se atual <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> é igual ao especificado <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> a comparar com a atual <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> é igual a atual <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified message’s action matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a ação a mensagem especificado corresponde a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>deste <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ação de uma mensagem é especificada pela <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> da mensagem</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message to compare.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem a comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação corresponder; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the action of the message contained by the specified message buffer matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a ação da mensagem contida na memória intermédia de mensagem especificado corresponde a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>deste <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ação de uma mensagem é especificada pela <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> da mensagem</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message buffer that contains the message to compare.
trans-unit.target: A memória intermédia de mensagens que contém a mensagem a comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação corresponder; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>representação do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> property is set, its value is used to build the string representation; otherwise, the base class <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>for definida, o seu valor é utilizado para criar a representação de cadeia; caso contrário, a classe base <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>valor é devolvido.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.
